attributes.action: Grant The Tones an OBE or MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Tones are the greatest band in my myspace friends list. 

I ask Gordon Brown to Grant each member of this funky, fun loving, hip swinging, toe tapping band either an OBE or MBE for their services to pop music - Like they did with the Beatles.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
